name: Skærmtrolden Hugo
overview: The first Hugo game based on the television show Eleva2ren was originally developed by Thomas Villadsen and Uffe Jakobsen for SilverRock Productions. Skærmtrolden Hugo was released for the Commodore 64 in 1991, and for the Amiga shortly afterwards. The game took place in a gold mine, which Hugo had to navigate to collect treasure. The game mechanics were simple and a complete game could take less than ten minutes.
